channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-20.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: See a kitty hard at work guarding a local specialty, dried bonito! Visit a restaurant that uses the ingredient in its curries, then head to the coast with kitty BFFs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ninja Truth
channel.desc: The arrival of guns in Japan changed the face of warfare. We examine the ninja's use of firearms, particularly in one famous assassination attempt, and the concealed guns they're said to have used.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: reporting to a superior that a coworker is ill. Tran Dinh Thang works at a construction firm in Kanagawa. In a roleplay challenge, he must report to a superior that a coworker has become ill.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Story Land In Classical Japanese
channel.desc: This program presents masterpieces of classical Japanese literature in both their original forms and modern translations, with easy-to-understand imagery that conveys the worldview of ancient Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: See a kitty hard at work guarding a local specialty, dried bonito! Visit a restaurant that uses the ingredient in its curries, then head to the coast with kitty BFFs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Bologna, a city in northern Italy, has been a commercial and transportation hub since ancient Rome. The pride of the city is Bologna University and porticoes, which are a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Kyoto has about 2,700 temples that hold an array of Buddhist statues. Sculptors breathe life into these objects of worship.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Flowers color life's important moments but are all too quickly discarded. Kawashima Haruka dries discarded flowers, giving them new purpose, ensuring they're cherished to the end.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Manben: Behind The Scenes Of Manga With Urasawa Naoki
channel.desc: Witness a manga brought to life! This episode features a master of mystery, Morohoshi Daijiro. Step into his one-of-a-kind office, filled with mysterious stories and...bones? Watch to find out more.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: A ride from one edge to the other of Japan's smallest prefecture, where a relative scarcity of natural resources has been historically offset by an unrelenting drive to create outstanding quality.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Experience the cutting edge of Japanese entertainment as we turn the spotlight on virtual artists. This week, the first virtual singer to play the Budokan: KAF.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at tatami mats: a quintessentially Japanese flooring material.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Kyoto has about 2,700 temples that hold an array of Buddhist statues. Sculptors breathe life into these objects of worship.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: Flowers color life's important moments but are all too quickly discarded. Kawashima Haruka dries discarded flowers, giving them new purpose, ensuring they're cherished to the end.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Bologna, a city in northern Italy, has been a commercial and transportation hub since ancient Rome. The pride of the city is Bologna University and porticoes, which are a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: The majority of Niger, in Africa, is occupied by the Sahara, and desertification is a major problem. Oyama Shuichi introduces his method of increasing vegetation using household waste.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Travel Japanese
channel.desc: #3 Doko desu ka? Where is it?/ When traveling in Japan for the first time, what phrases do you need? 4 episodes (3 minutes each) provide simple expressions you can put to use as soon as you land.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kaizoku: Seto Inland Sea
channel.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Seto Inland Sea.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Activate Your Japanese!
channel.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: NHK WORLD PREMIUM, a service aimed at people outside of Japan, broadcasts programs and news in Japanese. We explain how to use it and introduce features like online streaming.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: Advances in renewable energy are reducing fuel consumptions in shipping and other industries. Our report features a massive lightweight hard sail for ships and an ultracompact hydropower generator.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai: three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum. They compete to give the most powerful synchronized performance.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
channel.desc: The Oriental Stork is making a comeback. Experts have reintroduced it to Japan and expanded its breeding range. This episode examines what it takes to bring a species back from extinction.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords
channel.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, a sword made by Kuniyuki that is imbued with the power of the deity Fudo-myo-o.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: #42 I'm going to give them to Yuuki-san. / To explain what you intend to do, say a verb followed by "tsumori desu." So "watasu" (to give) becomes "watasu tsumori desu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet Polish Izabela Ishikawa who works to find and return the remains of those who died during World War II in Okinawa, and Hongkonger Wan Sze Ho, an instructor at a driving school in Kumamoto.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: A US rapper, who discovers the legacy of Hiroshima and Nagasaki, is moved to meet hibakusha and join anti-nuclear groups. He sees parallels between their discrimination and that of African Americans.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: Ren, from Vietnam, started a guesthouse in Nagano Prefecture. Her belief is: a welcoming environment leads to a more livable community. We take a look at interactions between Ren and the townspeople.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hit The Road 5minutes
channel.desc: Let's see Japan by car! We'll be driving through Hiroshima Prefecture, with our goal being the famed Itsukushima Shrine. Along the way, we'll make a few stops off the beaten path that will amaze you.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: A shrine in Nagasaki City, and its legendary camphor tree, survived the atomic bomb. But its beloved annual festival is in danger of extinction. How can the local community keep its traditions alive.

channel.title: Trails To Oishii Tokyo Mini
channel.desc: Shirasu are baby Japanese anchovies. Known for their clear, silvery-white appearance, these tiny things are packed with umami and nutrients.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Seto Inland Sea is the largest body of water of its kind in Japan. See the sights of the Great Seto Bridge and the shallow coastal waters through time-lapse photography.

channel.desc: On a shopping street in front of Kagoshima Chuo Station sits Japan' s original street piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: Shirakami-Sanchi, or the Shirakami Mountain Range, is home to one of the world's largest beech forests. Its pristine environment hosts a variety of wildlife, as well as a group of hunter-gatherers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: For over 150 years, Yamamoto Yasuo's family has made soy sauce in wooden barrels. This traditional method is close to dying out, but Yamamoto intends to keep it alive for future generations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Edo's Rush Hour
channel.desc: Edo was a city of waterways. The Yoroi Ferry transported people across the Nihonbashi River, one of its main commercial arteries. For the captain, it was a high-pressure job requiring skill and guts.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Carving The Spirit Of Fishermen
channel.desc: Hokkaido / Takeya Takayuki (model maker) Fishing boats in the herring industry-which thrived here until the 1950s-featured swirling decorations that made a big impression on Takeya, a Hokkaido native.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: At the Niihama Taiko Matsuri, teams of around 150 people carry taikodai: three-tonne parade floats housing a huge taiko drum. They compete to give the most powerful synchronized performance.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Glaucoma, which can lead to blindness, often shows no symptoms in the early stages.We feature the latest efforts to restore the optic nerve, including new surgical techniques and gene therapy.

channel.title: 1/45: Gambling Addiction
channel.desc: 1 in 45 Japanese are suspected of a gambling addiction. We follow a man who made a clean break from gambling, overcoming the crisis of a broken family, and is in the recovery process from addiction.

channel.desc: Dress a thick, fresh pork loin in fluffy breadcrumbs, then fry until golden. Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside-savor tonkatsu perfection from Chef Rika's and an artisan chef in Tokyo.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: An easily applicable paste can dramatically bolster the resiliency of masonry walls. And a treatment can make removing heavy stains from a variety of surfaces much easier.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Known for work that explores the traces of time's passage, photographer Ishiuchi Miyako has won numerous honors, including the prestigious Hasselblad Award. She shares insights about her photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: The Bird Cafe
channel.desc: We visit an Edo-style open-air teahouse, where the townspeople enjoyed refreshments, conversation, and the company of exotic birds. For them, these outings were about more than a good time.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A small train line in Shimabara, Nagasaki, is famous for its waterfront station that showcases rows of yellow handkerchiefs flying in the breeze. Why do so many come to visit this remote station.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: There's hardly a greater paradise than Japan for cat lovers. Researchers there explore subjects such as the evolutionary reason for cuteness, and how cat DNA may help treat kidney disease.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: An easily applicable paste can dramatically bolster the resiliency of masonry walls. And a treatment can make removing heavy stains from a variety of surfaces much easier.

channel.desc: Featured recipe: Dashimaki Omelet. Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: Northern Kazakhstan borders Russia and has historically been home to many ethnic Russians. However a recent rise in Kazakh migrants to the region has led to deepening tensions between the two groups.

channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: The Kii Mountain Range is home to three deeply important spiritual locations: Kumano, Yoshino and Omine, and Mt. Koya. These three sites are connected by a verdant 300 km pilgrims' path.

channel.title: 1/36: Foreign Residents In Japan
channel.desc: 1 in 36 people in Japan are foreign residents. As its population declines, we look at Japanese society in a new era of foreign workers, through an IT startup where 90% of staff are foreigners.

channel.desc: In this episode, we learn about risshu and shosho, two dates of early autumn. The temple chefs show us how to prepare dishes using winter melon and share their recipe for a Japanese-style ratatouille.

channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: A German playwright finds inspiration in a piano that survived the atomic bombing and its owner, who died after the blast at the age of 19, to create a piece warning against war's impact on the young.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hit The Road Gunma
channel.desc: To truly enjoy Gunma, travel by car is key. We start from Takasaki, where the bullet train stops, and make our way to Kusatsu hot springs, with world Heritage sites and local food along the way.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Document 72 Hours
channel.desc: A small train line in Shimabara, Nagasaki, is famous for its waterfront station that showcases rows of yellow handkerchiefs flying in the breeze. Why do so many come to visit this remote station.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: At Hibuse Matsuri, the Fire Prevention Festival, men douse buildings in water as a prayer for protection from fire. At this event held in January, bonfires and sake help to keep people warm.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: Echigo Tokimeki Railway and Hokuetsu Express, both third-sector railways in Niigata Prefecture, have struggled since the Hokuriku Shinkansen was extended to Kanazawa. See their efforts to survive.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Daniel Moore takes a cinematic journey through Nagano. In springtime he hits the south, experiencing the breathtaking cherry blossoms, and in winter gets lost in magical winter landscapes up north.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Yasuda Junichi directed "A Samurai in Time," a playful film made on a shoestring budget that became a word-of-mouth hit. Yasuda, who is also a rice farmer, gives us the behind-the-scenes story.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: Maminata Ouandaogo's passion for African hairstyles has helped hundreds in Japan with their natural hair. But outside her salon, she says social pressure keeps some people from embracing it.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ocean Super Year 2025
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- As oceans face climate, pollution, and resource challenges, the "Blue Economy" offers hope. Sunami Atsushi of the Sasakawa Peace Foundation, or SPF shares Japan's vision.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: At Hibuse Matsuri, the Fire Prevention Festival, men douse buildings in water as a prayer for protection from fire. At this event held in January, bonfires and sake help to keep people warm.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: EXPO 2025 Part 1: Designing the Future. A 2-part series on EXPO 2025 and its theme, Designing Future Society for Our Lives. The venue's diverse architecture offers hints for the future.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Daniel Moore takes a cinematic journey through Nagano. In springtime he hits the south, experiencing the breathtaking cherry blossoms, and in winter gets lost in magical winter landscapes up north.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: Northern Kazakhstan borders Russia and has historically been home to many ethnic Russians. However a recent rise in Kazakh migrants to the region has led to deepening tensions between the two groups.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: We follow a unique initiative led by expert horse-handler Iwama Takashi as he strives to harness the potential of horse-drawn carts to provide renewable electricity to off-grid communities in Senegal.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: The world comes alive in a different way after sunset, with bright city lights or the glow of a 24-hour industrial complex. See how the scenery changes through the night with time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: 1/36: Foreign Residents In Japan
channel.desc: 1 in 36 people in Japan are foreign residents. As its population declines, we look at Japanese society in a new era of foreign workers, through an IT startup where 90% of staff are foreigners.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Glaucoma, which can lead to blindness, often shows no symptoms in the early stages.We feature the latest efforts to restore the optic nerve, including new surgical techniques and gene therapy.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: A German playwright finds inspiration in a piano that survived the atomic bombing and its owner, who died after the blast at the age of 19, to create a piece warning against war's impact on the young.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: Northern Kazakhstan borders Russia and has historically been home to many ethnic Russians. However a recent rise in Kazakh migrants to the region has led to deepening tensions between the two groups.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
channel.desc: In this episode, we learn about risshu and shosho, two dates of early autumn. The temple chefs show us how to prepare dishes using winter melon and share their recipe for a Japanese-style ratatouille.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: A new care facility in Japan without any barriers between people with disabilities and the community is spotlighted. We take a close look at how one woman user changes by interacting with the locals.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: Maminata Ouandaogo's passion for African hairstyles has helped hundreds in Japan with their natural hair. But outside her salon, she says social pressure keeps some people from embracing it.
